item.title: UAB: Player arrested after stabbing 2 teammates
item.description: A UAB football player was arrested after stabbing two of his teammates Saturday morning at the football facility ahead of the Blazers' home game again...

item.title: Shanahan hopeful but admits Aiyuk case 'unusual'
item.description: Niners coach Kyle Shanahan alternated between offering insight and declining to provide specifics on wide receiver Brandon Aiyuk's status with the tea...

item.title: Manning makes Texas history after snagging TD
item.description: Arch Manning became the first Longhorns player to catch, throw and rush for a touchdown on a night in which he accounted for six scores.

item.title: Lavelle leads Gotham to 2nd NWSL title in 3 years
item.description: Gotham FC claimed the 2025 NWSL Championship on Saturday, defeating the Washington Spirit, 1-0.

item.title: Vandy's Pavia makes Heisman case in career day
item.description: Diego Pavia threw for a career-high 484 yards and five touchdowns and No. 14 Vanderbilt beat Kentucky 45-17 Saturday to keep its CFP hopes alive.
